original_text: I have not asked you to save me from the power of my enemy. Or to pay cruel people to let me go free. I have not asked you to save me from the power of my enemy. Or to pay cruel people to let me go free. I have not asked you to save me from the power of my enemy. Or to pay cruel people to let me go free. I have not asked you to save me from the power of my enemy. Or to pay cruel people to let me go free. I have not asked you to save me from the power of my enemy.
korean_text: 내가 언제 말하기를 원수의 손에서 나를 구원하라 하더냐 폭군의 손에서 나를 구원하라 하더냐

sentences.original_text: I have not asked you to save me
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 나를 구해달라고 요청하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: from the power of my enemy
